QuestData.Title: Uncovering the Artifact Fragments
QuestData.Description: The Artifact Fragments seem to come from any creature we've found in the outskirts of Ashran.$B$BGo out and kill any you find and bring at least fifty Artifact Fragments to Fura the Mage in Warspear Outpost.
QuestData.LogDescription: Fura in Warspear Outpost wants you to go kill creatures in the outskirts of Ashran outside of the main road and bring back 50 Artifact Fragments.
